website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and versatile, although not as solid as other models.
pros: Awarded the APMA Seal of Acceptance for promoting good foot health
Comes in Black, Black-Charcoal, Black-Soft Gray, Dusky Pink, Midnight Navy and Neon Blush
Breathable nylon knit uppers, round toe
Slip-on style with elasticized topline and heel tab
Slip-resistant sole with rubber pods outsole
cons: Some report their heel slips out of the shoe easily

customer_reviews.title: Ribs against ankle
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is super cute but the back rubbed the back of my ankle raw. I've worn the shoes twice and had to put bandaids on the back of my ankle each time.
customer_reviews.author: CCD1963

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have them in 3 colors. They are very lightweight - perfect for traveling. I usually wear a size 7.5, but in this shoes, the 7 fits perfectly. Good arch support. I have a broad foot and the fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: Safari Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes but hurt foot.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 8 in Fitflop sandals, 9 in shoes. I did need a 9 in these, and they still rubbed raw the back of my feet. Can only wear for short period of time. Hope to break them in well enough to wear long periods of time... they are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Bickers

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but
customer_reviews.text: I had to return. First off, believe what others have said about it running large. This particular shoe Ballerina Navy Midnight has a sparkly fabric...the material is stiff, as compared to a regular uberknit slipon. it was very uncomfortable...both for size and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Klee

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look nice but they're not for me
customer_reviews.text: I had bunion surgery on my right foot so I need shoes with roomy toebox. This shoes are not it. My feet were tired due to lack of arch support. After 30 minutes of walking my feet ache. The shoes look nice but they're not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wichuda Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and very attractive. Sadly, the company does not make a 5.5 so I purchased a 5. But I wear a 6 normally. The 5 is like a snug 6 so definitely these run large. I have tried a 6 on in a store and it's definitely too big for me. They claim to have little demand for a 5.5, go figure. No regrets, I really like the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Pink!
customer_reviews.text: I tried on and they seem quite comfortable however I bought the neon blush/white which looked like a nice neutral color online. But know that these are VERY PINK shoes. Not sure what "neon blush" is meant to mean, but they are not neon and there is no white. The picture makes them look more like a neutral color, but pink is what they are. I returned for a different color but disappointed in the picture and description.
customer_reviews.author: JDS2525

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So far so good just tried them on I'm going to walk around top is a little snug hoping once I walk around and then it won't be so snug
customer_reviews.author: Gina Theresa Colo Graham D.D

customer_reviews.title: What the heck happened to the fitflop brand ???????
customer_reviews.text: I like these!! I’m a big girl with a wide foot These are great! Easy on off cute summer shoe!! Ordered 4 pairs of fit flops and they are garbage now!! I only kept these they must have been made before fit flops changed there width ! I’m saying can a big girl get a cute and comfortable flip flop that isn’t made for my grandma!! Fit flops were my favorite now there garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Brown

customer_reviews.title: Losing Crystals With Every Wear
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are probably the most comfortable tennis type shoe I've ever owned. I have three pairs and would buy them on every color if I could. However I've lowered my original review to a "3" because after just three months of careful wear and care, the crystal beads are falling off. Like, a lot. Really disappointed to have paid this much and have them deteriorating so quickly. I store them in their original box and never wear them in wet weather. Despite this care, they have "patches" of missing crystals and I'm finding crystals in the car, in the box, etc. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde & Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Good after ankle surgery
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed to wear an ankle splint after ankle surgery and I wanted a very stretchy shoe. They are perfect. They are cute and comfortable and meet my needs perfectly. I iwill continue to wear them after I discontinue the splint because they are comfortable and provide nice support.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Blackmore

customer_reviews.title: No support.
customer_reviews.text: Too big! Not a lot of support and the insoles are stuck in, they will come out if you unstick them. I wanted to try them with my own orthotics but I didn’t want to ruin them and then send them back so I didn’t bother I just returned them, unfortunately I didn’t realise the company charge a restocking fee and I had to take them to a UPS store rather than a Kohl’s (so much more handy and you don’t have to wrap them) will not buy for this company again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette A.

customer_reviews.title: My feet are very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Lately started to have problems with my feet. Was looking for comfortable shoes. Tried different brands but Fitflop bits them all. My feet are happy all day. I also have dry blisters between my toes and they are painful, needed shoes with wide toe box. Fitflop does it all for me. I am replacing all my shoes with Fitflop. I usually wear 8-8.5, Fitflop size 8 works perfect for me. When my feet get swollen there is still some room, my feet are not squeezed. Very happy with Fitflop products. My favorite shoes company.
customer_reviews.author: Olesya Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are gorgeous, but I had to return them because they were too tight. Regular FitFlop Uberknit ballet flats run a little wide, which is what I need. But these fit probably more true to size. So if your foot is a standard width...you'll love them! But if you are looking for a wider fit like the regular Fitflop Uberknits, these might not work for you. I really wish they fit. They're really beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: These fit flops are extremely comfortable and my third pair
customer_reviews.text: These fit flops are extremely comfortable and my third pair. I ordered a half size smaller as suggested and I wear them every day. I have a bad back and planter fasciitis and these are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Just AMAZINGLY comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! I work Retail and have plantar fasciitis. Finding FitFlops has been my saving grace. I got them a little larger than my regular shoe size expecting to put an inner sole in, but all for naught. It ended up working out perfectly. Not only are they comfortable, but stunning as well. I highly recommend these for everyone. I'm getting a pair for my son, who also works retail. Best buy ever!
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: The Urban white color seems to be poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mauve colored shoe, and it was fine and I loved it. So I purchased the Urban White also. Turns out the Urban White was shipped differently, so I think it came from a different Seller. It seemed very different in quality and like a knockoff compared the other one that I bought just days before so I returned it. The Seller then charged me a 20% 'restocking' fee!! Buyer BEWARE! The Urban white seems to be a knockoff!
customer_reviews.author: Allura

customer_reviews.title: Too large int he heel
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot but have been able to wear some FitFlops with extra liners in them. This style, however, is very large in the heel area so I couldn't maneuver it to fit. Other FitFlots have been great walking shoes. I look forward to more slip on styles with new fabrics
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine D.

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty severe plantar fasciitis that I hasn't gone away with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty severe plantar fasciitis that I hasn't gone away with stretching and rest, but wearing these shoes EVERYWHERE has been a lifesaver. I wear them just to walk around the house. These shoes breathe, are easy to get on and off but don't slip while I'm wearing them, I wear them with just about every outfit, and my feet don't hurt! Thank you FitFlop!
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Look great but hurts the back of my foot
customer_reviews.text: I tried these exact shows on in Macy's and they were charging 100.00! So I looked for them on Amazon, found them and ordered the same size I tried on. The left foot rubs against the back of my foot so I stopped wearing them because of the blister. I will wait awhile to try again, I didn't want to send them back until I do but I think it might be too late now.
customer_reviews.author: Paparazzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. One word of caution is that the arch support is slight. Otherwise, they are heaven to wear. Very well cushioned. Comfortable elastic band fit. Great for exercising legs as with all fit flops. I wear them for my two mile walks. Socks not required.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pocker

customer_reviews.title: They are GREAT for helping with lower back aches if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy in the toe area - I need to wear socks with them. They are GREAT for helping with lower back aches if you are walking on a hard surface all day. I go shopping in them and it is such a change - like my feet spring off the floor and I don't get fatigued like before in a wedge shoe.
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: ... as red as expected more a coral but still liked them just changing what I'm wearing them with and ...
customer_reviews.text: Color wasn't as red as expected more a coral but still liked them just changing what I'm wearing them with and they're cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a vacation to Europe. I wanted comfortable, cute and sparkly and they are all of that. I got many compliments on how cute they all and they were very comfortable. Would consider buying this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mimijo

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on Air!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews, the good, the bad, the indifferent, I decided to give these a try. The fit is amazingly comfortable. I wear a full size 10 M and ordered that size. These are like walking on air! Good-bye Sketchers! I have just ordered my second pair these are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can walk in these for shopping or take the dog for a walk and my feet don’t get sore. This brand is one of the best fit for comfort for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Like floating on air
customer_reviews.text: Love these...first day out of the box I wore them to Epcot with no problem. They are one of the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever worn. I have worn FitFlops flip flops but because of a foot surgery I can no longer do so. These slip ons make up for that and then some. I will be ordering a few new pairs...I must have more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try Try Again
customer_reviews.text: I went down 1/2 size to 7 1/2 and these were slipping off when I walked. I own three pair in 7 1/2 so I was disappointed to say the least. I am going to try for another pair/color as the price is excellent on Amazon. Thanks... I’m a Prime Customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had more arch support like the thongs
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had more arch support like the thongs. I inserted an arch support and it worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: lingling

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE BUT TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes - super cute. Unfortunately, they were too big and I returned them. I would suggest going down a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Starling

customer_reviews.title: Fitflop has a winner with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the open weave on top is great for summer wear. Only complaint is that the coral color is less coral and more very orange than it appears on line.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Works for a narrow heel
customer_reviews.text: I need a narrow heel and have been unable to wear other shoes like this because they were too loose in the heel. When I’ve worn these in the house, they stay on comfortably. Hopefully that will be true when I wear them all day!
customer_reviews.author: NCB

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The worst shoes I tried recently. They look like they would be comfortable but they are terrible. They are being returned ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Bad blue tape in shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had bought these before somewhere else and loved them - still do, but this pair has a blue tape inside the toe box which causes feet or socks to turn blue when wearing. The shoes I ordered are blush. If caught in the rain, this pair will be ruined. Tape can not be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Ladysun

customer_reviews.title: It works if you wear 1/2 sizes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits me well, I am glad they run a little large because I can wear socks or not. I have that weird sized foot, I wear a 10 and my foot is about a .25 inch over the size I wear. They don’t have 1/2 sizes so it works for me. I have another pair (different style) that is a 10 they fit snug. I also bought an 11 and they were to big. I have to send them back🙁
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I like these because I don’t like to show my toes in the summer. These are comfortable,lightweight and sporty.
customer_reviews.author: rafael crespo

customer_reviews.title: I wish they made this in a narrow width
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe but my heel was too narrow. So unfortunately I had to return this. Too bad because it is a well cushioned slip on shoe. Construction quality looks to be very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, casual summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these shoes. I wanted an easy summer slip-on shoe that gave support similar to a sneaker. I found it here. The one downside is that I have a narrow heel so the backs slip somewhat when I walk. I'm a size 7 and the fit everywhere else is great, so I wouldn't be able to go down a size. I feel like the opening could be a bit tighter.
customer_reviews.author: B Maroni

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these shoes. I walk in them every day. They are comfortable and give me the needed arch support that I expect from Fit Flops.
customer_reviews.author: Viclyn

customer_reviews.title: Best fit flop shoe I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the second review first one never got posted. Best fit flop shoe I ever had. Now I own 2 pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte E. Lesico

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good for travelling. Fit perfectly very comfortable, arch support & light!
customer_reviews.author: Julie N

customer_reviews.title: Like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and ended up ordering my regular size. The shoes fit and are very comfortable. Had never tried this brand before but would consider buying other styles from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: dogmamma

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Runs large like most fitflop so size down this is one of my favorite styles this year and oh so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: stpilar

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Bought 1/2 size down as recommended. I bought another pair ! Pink cream and now the grey blue. Love
customer_reviews.author: laura prefontaine

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's foot is so narrow it is hard for her to shoe shop. She fell in love with the fitflop shoe and has a few pairs now. The light blue with sparkle which we purchased was super cute and very VERY comfortable. Shoe fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Goldwag

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but too sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, cushioned, great arch support, fit perfect. I didn’t like the sparkle on them. Wish I could find them without.
customer_reviews.author: M. sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and very comfortable. These shoes did not disappoint. Just waiting for the spring to wear them since they’re white. Would definitely buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Maibaby523

customer_reviews.title: Close toe fit flop
customer_reviews.text: I adore fit flops, could have a little more support. Love wearing them, fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. So supportive it's almost like not wearing shoes at all. I love them so much I bought some for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Shonda L Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and was an exact fit to my usual size. Comfy and stylish. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the most comfortable shoes I own. I love them. This is my second pair I have them in blush and denim.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Walker must have
customer_reviews.text: I took these on vacation out of country the day after they arrived. These shoes are so comfortable and can handle a full day of walking to take in the sights.
customer_reviews.author: Y. L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Sadly, it looks like the style is no longer being manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: The most confortable shoes a person could have!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most confortable shoes a person could have! They are worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, stenches
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they do stretch. Its takes time for them to form to your foot, mine slips off my heel. Once it forms, stops slipping. Super light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: I could use more arch support as I am flat footed especially on R side.
customer_reviews.author: Namo

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy-just what I expect from FitFlop. I am usually a size 9 and ordered 8 1/2 which fits well. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the run narrow
customer_reviews.text: they were hard to get on because of the high top of the shoe ,.,,wish I could have wore them
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: lightweight comfort for everyday walking, a tiny bit abrasive in the back at the top
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe except that the back rubbed the skin off of the back of my foot a bit when I wore them for a longer time. I have sensitive skin. Most people may not have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful same as comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s the second pair I ordered, love these shoes. Wear from morning to evening, beautiful and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: dafdo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but has wide heel
customer_reviews.text: these are sparkly! If that's what you like then, great. They heel was too wide so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Henson

customer_reviews.title: Price depends on color.
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Very comfortable and cute. Wish the price was the same for all other colors. I don't understand why the price depends on what color you want. Very sad. I'd like to order another pair but I'd like to pay the same price as I did for these. Not $30.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty, comfortable shoe. I have three other pairs - I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Marian Raccuglia

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Fitflop!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite Fitflop. I have 3 colors of this style.
customer_reviews.author: Lou A. Boyers

customer_reviews.title: Fitflop you never disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of the flats alone not counting the sanders I have
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes. They are light weight, comfortable, are made of a stretchy breathable fabric that feels good! I received them on a Friday night and the next day wore them out shopping all day with no problems. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pace

customer_reviews.title: Pat
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and so comfy. Looking at the other colors for more.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The width was a little narrower than expected but I think it will expand over time as it is worn. For the most part, a comfortable shoe and the shipping was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable I ordered another pair and have told my friends ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable I ordered another pair and have told my friends about the shoe! Good ole fit flops!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this style!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have 3 pair and they run true to size. A nice alternative to a lace-up.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes however the color was not what I expected. I found color the most difficult part of shopping online for these shoes. But.....they fit well and look fun, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fiechter

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and pretty
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for my mom but watch sizes, they are not consistent
customer_reviews.author: Charles d McCormick

customer_reviews.title: FitFlop is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I wear Fit Flop brand shoes just about every day...I have pretty bad feet and they are super comfy and recommended by my podiatrist!!!
customer_reviews.author: DAW666

customer_reviews.title: Classy comfort-shoes
customer_reviews.text: The pair I gave my mother-in-law for Christmas did not disappoint. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: coltsca

customer_reviews.title: Great shies
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable. I own them in every color. Look good with shorts pants and dresses. Really cute and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 was more like a seven
customer_reviews.text: 6 was more like a seven , like the shoes, kind of like keds but more support and not so flat.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome walking shoes- very comfortable on your feet and back feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I get more compliments on these shoes than any others I have had!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sims

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are great, super comfortable. They do run large, my feet do come out a little, but the one size smaller was too tight.
customer_reviews.author: lcc408

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like that they fit your wide throughout the day. When the foot is smaller in the am to when your feet swell later in the day. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara clark

customer_reviews.title: Fitflop
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad foot and this seems to work better than a regular tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I normally wear a 7 1/2 shoe so ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I normally wear a 7 1/2 shoe so I ordered a size 8 and it fit fine
customer_reviews.author: S. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute, but were too short. My toe touched the top of the toe of the shoe uncomfortably. Also, the edge of the shoe rubbed against my heel and was painful. Maybe they would have been better in a 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Kamay

customer_reviews.title: Very lively shoe
customer_reviews.text: Hoping with more wear the shoes will fit better. Most fit flops I purchased fit wonderfully, this pair is a tad short.
customer_reviews.author: Loolah

customer_reviews.title: Knit FitFlop good but disappointed in the other  styles.
customer_reviews.text: Like these SO much I bought 2 other styles of FitFlop. While this pair was very nice the other 2 styles I purchased were a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of these. They are great summer shoes. They run a half size big. I usually wear a 7 but in this shoe 61/2 is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Price

customer_reviews.title: The very best shoe I`ve ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the only thing I wear! I now own 5 pairs. They fit my difficult feet without the heaviness that most tie shoes have. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tasa

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8-8.5. First bought a size 8.5. Way too large...slipped off my foot. Bought a size 8...still too large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit flop fits
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and very comfortable. I bought black/ white as well as pair of plain black. These do not fit on right shoe as heel is very wrong. Am extremely disappointed. Black pair useless for me😢😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Jenny From Oz

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and easy to slip on. A little tight around opening that makes top of foot swell after wearing an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Very fun shoe that fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and just has the subtle hint of bling!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Mecusker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are like walking on a cloud! Super light and comfortable. I want a pair in every color!
customer_reviews.author: KathyHill

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Comfortable, cute, wonderful for walking, shopping, weekend fun. I have plantars faciitis and these shoes help keep my feet feeling good. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jane peters

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable slip ons! Absolutely love them! Already ordered another!! Already a fan of fitflops boots so it was no surprise that these are great too!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Order Half size down
customer_reviews.text: I love them, though I am usually an 8.5, I wish I would have ordered an 8
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Deeter

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: My mother is satisfied with shoes because they are so comfortable. It's a little big, but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hyeonuk

customer_reviews.title: Comfy cute
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo comfortable and cute! Fitflops are my favorite comfort shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey V

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Exactly what I was looking for. Great cushion comfort and arch support. Great price too! Hooked on FitFlops.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: They fit great. They are very comfortable. Love the way they feel!
customer_reviews.author: DeniseCorrado

product_meta.title: FitFlop Women's Uberknit Crystal Ballet Flats
product_meta.description: The Ballet Flats with more pump less thump. They’re soft, stretchy, sporty-looking, fun, feather-light, unbeatably comfortable (obviously) and they breathe. In a collection of great colors to dovetail into whatever you’re doing – and this season smothered in twinkling multi-tonal crystals – these shimmery shoes are a must-have.
feature_bullets: Ultra-light stretchy breathable single-piece nylon mix knit uppers
APMA Seal of Acceptance for footwear found to promote good foot health
